name: Quem Eu Estou Onde Eu Sou
name_original: Quem Eu Estou Onde Eu Sou
description:
Quem Eu Estou Onde Eu Sou

Welcome visitor, It is a great pleasure to see you here. I'll start by presenting this project to you.

This is a horror game that -hmm... My master said "do not reveal too many details to the people on the other side", all I can say is that you will have to discover the secrets of our world, so you will contribute to the uncertain future of it.

Gameplay

First person, survival horror, jumpscare, explore to find the way 

planned for future versions: shooting, escape room, puzzle and others

Updates v0.1: The BeginningFirst Release
World Current State: Chaos
MaStEr: 1, MaStEr SuBoRdInAtEs: 1
MaNaGeRs: 0, TeStErS: 1 Before you buy
  • This game still in development.
  • Soon a free Demo will be available.
  • I recommend this game to people who like to follow game development and contribute to it .(if you prefer a complete game, do not buy it yet, unless you're rich)
  • The Discord server will be an important part of the game development, because the story will be built from the interaction of the players (something like role playing), but it is optional.
Community

Join our Discord server

Recommended system requirements:

Note: This is the system used for the game development, it is not accurate, it is only a reference. If you have something higher than that, you will not have problems playing.

  • OS: Windows 10.
  • CPU: Intel Core i3-3220 3.30GHz.
  • RAM: 6GB.
  • GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti 1GB.
  • Monitor Resolution 1366x768
